amendment.description: To require passenger and baggage screeners at New Castle Airport in Wilmington, Delaware as long as commercial air service is provided at that airport.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4608 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4608 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S7497-7498; text: CR S7497) To require passenger and baggage screeners at New Castle Airport in Wilmington, Delaware as long as commercial air service is provided at that airport.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4608 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4608 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Biden.
